channel.title: Please Help ! [317]
channel.description:
IM EXPERINCED AS A CODER SO YOU DON'T HAVE TO SPOON FEED ME WITH MOST THINGS. I AM USING DELTA.
1. I know how to add npc emotes for blocking, dying, & attacking, but how do I add them for standing and walking?
2. How can I add godwars maps. Don't give me cocoa's tutorial because I already tried and it didn't work.
3. How can I create new classes to handle things? For example, a cookingHandler, or herblore handler. My client.java is too big (almost 700kb) and i need to reduce lag.
4. How can i add prayers to the prayer tab, for example, project insanity has turmoil, and the creators added it the prayer tab, how can i do something like that with my own prayer?
5. How can I add NPC clipping

item.title: Please Help ! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Yeah took me like an 45 minutes to write that… but i figured you said you were experienced and could understand it.

item.title: Please Help ! [317]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

J192 i dont understand why you post you havnt been helpful on any of your posts

@Clawz fury

Open server.java

If your server has a Potion.java
then

you will need to search for a line like this

One thing you could do is Make your Run.bat File
Should be a line somthine like -Xmx500m
Or somthing
that 500M means MBytes
Just increase this Number Unsure if any number works i would just go with 812 Or higher.

        public static potions potions = null;

and add the name of the file you would like
It could be cookingHandler
so you would right

public static cookingHandler cookingHandler = null;

now you will be looking for this
same file server.java

		npcHandler = new NPCHandler();
		itemHandler = new ItemHandler();
		doorHandler = new DoorHandler();
		GraphicsHandler = new GraphicsHandler();
		//checkPlayerCapes = new checkPlayerCapes();
		/*handlers made by Delta*/

add this line

		cookingHandler = new cookingHandler();

Now you will be adding a new file right click on background create notepad Open note pad Save as

cookingHandler.java

Capitalization does matter.

Now

First Lines in that file should be

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class cookingHandler {
}

Then you will adding a Void to handle your Cooking

	public void cook(int item, int slot, int ID) {
		boolean used = true;
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
		if (item != c.playerItems[slot] - 1){//This makes sure you have it.
			return;
		}

make sure that isnt the end of your code. you will still need a bracket at the end looks like this }
This will check to have it in your inventory still - think its to prevent CheatEngine

		if (c.playerHasItem(item)) {
			switch (item) {
                Case FoodID:
                //what it does
                break;

Every Case Will need a break; at the end or will continue to the next case
for example

case 1:
case 2:
case 3:
c.addItem(4,1);
c.deleteItem(1,1);
c.deleteItem(2,1);
c.deleteItem(3,1);
break;

Just up to you Coding should look something like this

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class cookingHandler {
	public void cook(int item, int slot, int ID) {
		boolean used = true;
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
		if (item != c.playerItems[slot] - 1){//This makes sure you have it.
			return;
		}
		if (c.playerHasItem(item)) {
			switch (item) {
                Case FoodID:
                //what it does
                break;
                }
                }
        }
}

What it does is it could Call up a Public void from your client
so you would put
c.CookFood(ItemId);

But you would need to define your public void

Where i Normaly put my ActionbuttonId’s
it now goes in to this ClickingMost.java

Like so

		case 185:
			// clicking most buttons
			actionButtonId =  misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize);
			if (!validClient)
				break;
			if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("penguin")){
			println("ab=" + actionButtonId);
			}
			if (!antiHax())
				break;
				resetAction();
				server.clickingMost.clicking(playerId);
				break;

For eating Food i simply call this

		case 122:
			// Call for burying bones
			junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();
			ItemSlot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();
			ItemID = inStream.readUnsignedWordBigEndian();
			actionInterval = getbattleTimer();
			lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis();
			server.potions.buryItem(ItemID, ItemSlot, playerId);
			break;
		server.potions.buryItem(ItemID, ItemSlot, playerId);

would just change to a

		server.cookingHandler.cookItem(ItemID, ItemSlot, playerId);

1 thing i did was add a objectHandler.java

So it would be
server.objectHandler.objectItem(ObjectId);

This would go in a objectHandler.java

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
import java.io.FileReader;
import java.io.IOException;

public class objectHandler {
	public void objectId(int Object) {
		boolean used = true;
		client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[ID];
		if (c.ObjectID == Object) {
			switch (Object) {
                Case Objectid:
                //what it does
                break;
                }
                }
        }
}

This would go in your client.java
Where ever it says

if (ObjectId == whatever) {
}

Then add this

If (ObjectId >= 0) {
server.objectHandler.objectId(ObjectId);
}

Then move everything Over Line by Line untill Complete in your objecthandler.java File

To check for Npc Clipping
Open NpcHandler.java

Look for this

	public static int worldmap2[][] = {
			{
			/* 01 */3257, 3258, 3260, 3261, 3261, 3262, 3261, 3262, 3257,
					3258, 3257, 3258, 3254, 3255, 3254, 3255, 3252, 3252, 3250,
					3251, 3250, 3251, 3249, 3250, 3249, 3250, 3242, 3242, 3243,
					3243, 3257, 3244, 3245, 3244, 3245, 3247, 3248, 3250, 3251,
					3255, 3256, 3255, 3256, 3259, 3260, },
			{
			/* 01 */3256, 3256, 3256, 3256, 3266, 3266, 3267, 3267, 3270,
					3270, 3271, 3271, 3272, 3272, 3273, 3273, 3275, 3276, 3277,
					3277, 3278, 3278, 3279, 3279, 3280, 3280, 3285, 3286, 3289,
					3290, 3289, 3297, 3297, 3298, 3298, 3298, 3298, 3297, 3297,
					3297, 3297, 3298, 3298, 3297, 3297, }, };

First line is AbsX
Second Line is AbsY
Makes it so they can’t walk to those Spots.

IM EXPERINCED AS A CODER SO YOU DON’T HAVE TO SPOON FEED ME WITH MOST THINGS. I AM USING DELTA.
